name: Inuyasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale
description: InuYasha: A Feudal Fairy Tale (犬夜叉 戦国お伽合戦, Inuyasha: Sengoku Otogi Kassen) is a 2D fighting game based on the manga and anime series Inuyasha. It consists of battles and minigames in an effort to retrieve shards of the sacred Jewel of Four Souls, essentially following the overall plot of the series.
